name: Existential Debate | Visual Novel
description:
My first visual novel game :) 

The game takes place in a podcast between two characters that are debating the nature of existence with the player as the host or a Judge.

| Credits

Dialog Text Sound Effects by Alan Dalcastagne

Lo-Fi Beat Coffee by Alex-Productions

xNode - Unity Node Editor by Thor Brigsted

Unity XNode Tutorial: Making a Dialogue System by Harrison Gowland

Adding a Node Editor - Simple Dialog System Pt.4 (Unity3D Tutorial) by BRAINSHACK
